Posts.Title: Angry !

Posts.Content: Hi Jane this is my third attempt at a reply - post is accepted - shows on thread - then disappears My magic cream is  AMETOP GEL - I had a port inserted because of the many blood tests going out of and chemo, scan dyes etc going into my uncooperative veins - I apply this half an hour or so before any 'assault' and now I don't feel a thing and it takes a second as opposed to .................. huge success I have also had gas before a general anaesthetic - also a huge success and would happily have had this again if I didn't have the port. hope this helps sue
Posts.Title: Magic Cream or Gas for General Anaesthetic
